version_description:
We’ve added 110,000 objects to the map, including:
• 16,000 restaurants,
• 14,000 stores,
• 4,000 points of interest.

Bugfixes.

We’ve added 110,000 objects to the map, including:
• 16,000 restaurants,
• 14,000 stores,
• 4,000 points of interest.

Maps Got Smaller
Maps require up to 20% less storage.

Transliteration into Latin
If a street or an object doesn't have a name in your language, it will be spelt using the Latin alphabet.

New Map Style for Driving
Car navigation mode
Critical bugfixes

We’ve added 210,000 objects to the map, including:
- 19,000 restaurants,
- 17,000 stores,
- 5,000 points of interest.

The inability to build a route has been fixed.
Transliteration: We added an option to turn it off and we don't apply i

— Choose and book popular tours on place pages of tourist cities all over the world.
— Plan car routes with an intermediate stop.
— Order Yandex.Taxi directly from the app (available in major cities of Russia, Belarus, Kazakhstan, Armenia and Georgi

— Choose and book popular tours on place pages of tourist cities all over the world.

— Order Yandex.Taxi directly from the app (available in major cities of Russia, Belarus, Kazakhstan, Armenia and Georgi

— Bugfixes
— Updated map data

— Bugfixes
— Updated map data

— We made pedestrian and bicycle navigation several times faster.
— Intermediate stops in the auto, bicycle, and pedestrian navigation, fixed errors.
— Made map updating 10 times smaller.
— We launched Local Ads, a service for small and medium-si

*Bugfixes
*We’ve added 610,000 objects to the map, including:
- 22,000 restaurants,
- 18,000 stores,
- 5,000 points of interest.
Please update maps to see changes.

You can now leave ratings and reviews even offline!
We speeded up the search by category and made it more relevant.
Added new categories to the editor.
Local Ads: monitor the ad campaigns statistics in your personal account - you can access it by

漏洞修复；
我们在地图上添加了173 198个物体，包括：
- 17 125 家咖啡馆和餐厅；
- 12 356 家商店；
- 3 227 个景点；
请更新地图查看变更。

- Build your routes using subways in 74 cities! Of course, offline is available. Checklist of the cities on support.maps.me.
- Discover things around in one click! We added a Discovery button to the bottom menu.
- Christmas Sale! Advertise your bus

Bugfixes;
Map updates:
+ 226 383 objects (incl. cafes, attractions, etc.);
+ 18 cities with rapid-transit navigation;
+ 437 000 km of roads and trails;
Please update maps to see changes.

- Bugfixes;
- iPhone X adapted;

- iPhone X adapted;
- Bugfixes;
- We added 9 more cities with rapid-transit navigation, and now we cover 101 cities in total. To check the list of cities, please use support.maps.me;
- Please update maps to see changes;

This time around, we were focusing on Mars mapping for Elon Musk, but then we realized that space will soon be overcrowded. So we decided to insert check-in and check-out fields to our Hotel filters. With their help, MAPS.ME will show you hotels available

This time around, we were focusing on Mars mapping for Elon Musk, but then we realized that space will soon be overcrowded. So we decided to insert check-in and check-out fields to our Hotel filters. With their help, MAPS.ME will show you hotels available

- 今日は [kon'nichiwa] means ‘hello’ in Japanese;
- ‘Olá’ means ‘hello’ in Portuguese;
- ‘Hola’ means ‘hello’ in Spanish;
Learn these words and plan your trip to Japan or South America because we have just covered all Japanese and South American

- We reinvented bookmarks! You can back up them and create lists - just look at them on the map! They are gorgeous!
- We reimagined the way of booking! Find the hotel on the map and book it, or select a similar one.
- We created a special search cat

- We reinvented bookmarks! You can back up them and create lists - just look at them on the map! They are gorgeous!
- We reimagined the way of booking! Find the hotel on the map and book it, or select a similar one. - We created a special search catego

* Remember our new amazing dynamic bookmarks? We’ve made them even better. Have a look and let us know what you think. The hotel icon in bookmarks has also made a comeback.
* Updated maps:
+ 4450 attractions;
+ 15161 cafes and restaurants;
* F

*World Football Cup 2018 Edition*
We have created the search category “World Football Cup”. The category is available in the host cities. By tapping on it, you will see key objects on the map related to the Football Cup:
- Stadiums
- FAN ID centr

*World Football Cup 2018 Edition*
- We have created the search category “World Football Cup”. The category is available in the host cities. By tapping on it, you will see key objects on the map related to the Football Cup:
- Stadiums
- FAN ID cen

- MAPS.ME now has a route library! Hundreds of detailed routes all around the world: where to go, what to see, where to eat.
- Popular locations nearby! Discover nearby section will help you find the most popular places in the city.
- Attractive of

We have launched subscription to the MAPS.ME travel guides catalogue!

Now you don't need to buy a separate guide, because you can get unlimited access to the entire library of MAPS.ME travel guides!

Bookmarks are now even easier to use! You

Good news for car enthusiasts: MAPS.ME is now available for the CarPlay system! Travelling by car has become even more convenient: navigation, search, bookmarks – everything works without the Internet.

During each update we add more new places to our maps to your journey even more enjoyable.

This time we've added:
6000+ attractions
15000+ cafés and restaurants
7000+ shops

You can search for the attractions by yourself or just us

Now you can purchase more than 700 partner routes from different categories:
- Basic: a set of main locations and a brief description
- City Overview: up to 200 of the most useful and interesting points around the city
- PRO: routes with detailed

Create your own guides on MAPS.ME and share your favorite places with like-minded people.

Explore interesting locations, new experiences and share your passion for adventures with thousands of travelers around the planet. We’ve created a web-editor

- Subway maps are available in 156 cities! And yes, you can build routes with their help, offline as usual.
- We have already downloaded 97 detailed guides of 60 cities to our catalogue. All guides work in offline mode! You can find the catalogue from

- Wiki articles are now available offline. These are Wikipedia descriptions that are uploaded to popular sights so you can learn more about the surrounding places.
- We have added running routes to our guidebook directory. Now you can learn about inter

And, finally, ads removal has been launched.

We've marked toll and dirt roads and even ferry crossings on the maps:

- When a route is under construction, the paved and unpaved sections will be displayed on the map (if your route happens to come across them)
- You can configure detour route

We've marked toll and dirt roads and ferry crossings on the maps:

- When a route is being built on the map, the paved and unpaved sections are displayed (if your route happens to come across them)
- You can configure detour routes in the app its

We have updated our guidebook directory. Now it'll be even easier to choose the right one:

- Guides and cities have their own pages
- Guide maps contain previews of points on the map, the length of the route and a brief description about it

During each update we add more new places to our maps to make your journey even more enjoyable.

This time we've added:
2500+ attractions
22000+ cafés and restaurants
15000+ shops

This version also includes bug fixes for iOS 1
This version includes bug fixes.

New routes, guides gallery and bookmarks

• Subscription for outdoor enthusiasts City + Outdoor Pass: 15,000+ routes for nature and cities
• Routes are now in pages of attractions: read about interesting places and choose guides that include them

We've added graphic layer of the heights. Mountain and hill navigation has become easier. To enable heightmapping press the layer button in the top left corner of the screen and choose “Terrain”. The function is available offline.

An elevation profile will be available in newly purchased guides. Evaluate the difficulty of the upcoming track offline with a special cursor.
Download and try in the "Free samples" section of the catalog.
We have launched a new layer with guides on the map. Activate it in the application settings menu to quickly find interesting city routes and guides for outdoor activities.

With each App update, the maps are filled with new places to make your trip interesting.

Thanks to the maps update by the OSM community, in this version were added:
1400+ attractions
10000+ cafes and restaurants
6500+ shops
New design of the guides catalog. Planning future trips is easier now.

- Booking hotels on the map has become even more convenient! Now you can select dates, number of guests, and use filters with rating, price category and type of accommodation.
- The app now has a 7-day trial for travel guides catalog subscription. Try
